issue.title: [Packaging][Python] Ensure setuptools version during build supports markdown
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11198](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11198). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We use a `text/markdown` long description and thus should always build/upload with at least setuptools 38.6.
